title: Otto's Irresistible Dance

The dancer has Disadvantage on Attack Rolls and Dexterity Saving Throws.

Otto's Irresistible Dance is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Otto's Irresistible Dance is a Lvl 6 Spell from the Enchantment school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or interact with the environment.

Otto's Irresistible Dance Information
